triples.name: K-means clustering
triples.relevance: The paper extends and improves upon the fundamental k-means clustering algorithm by proposing an unsupervised variant that automatically determines the number of clusters.

triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: Clustering is the core task that the paper addresses with its novel unsupervised k-means algorithm.

triples.name: Unsupervised learning
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on developing an unsupervised learning approach for k-means clustering that works without labeled data or manual initialization.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning is the broader field in which the proposed clustering algorithm operates.

triples.name: Pattern recognition
triples.relevance: Pattern recognition is a key application domain for clustering algorithms mentioned in the paper's abstract.
